resources.string: and avoid or tap the meteors
Collect these to be the very best
Do you want to exit the game?

The rocket is controlled by the orientationsensor in your device. When you hold your device in level, the rocket should not move (Check the settings if this is not the case). If you tilt your device in one direction, the rocket will begin to move.

If you collide with a meteor, you will lose milk. So be sure to dodge them or tap them with your finger to iliminate them. When you destroy it with a fingertap, you may find something useful in the wreckage.
There are meteors that can slow you down.
And meteors that will stun you for a moment.
Some meteors will try to follow you.
And some meteors cannot be destroyed with only one single tap, instead they break down into new ones.
To fill your container you should milk cows by touching them with the rocket. Once you are at 0 milk, you will lose.
This old cow is a little bit confused, so it may changed the direction.
Ghost cows will grant you a shield for a short time, which prevents you from losing milk and removes all negative effects on you.
The dancing cow tries to avoid you, catch it anyway.
This cow is to fat too move, but if it cannot find any grass at its position (which is rare in space), it will disapear. So hurry up, because it gives a lot of milk.
The milk of zombie cows will infect the milk in your container, so it would be a good idea to avoid them.
To raise your maximum milk container capacity, you should collect this containers.
If you eat this nitro cheese everything else will seem slower for a short time.
Ring the bell to allure some cows.
To get in the highscore collect as many coins as you can. And with more coins your level raises which means the adventure gets harder and you can discover more different cows and other gameobjects.
This rocket is less likely hit by meteors
Get more milk in your container at the start of a game
Lets you collect coins over a bigger distance
Lets you milk cows over a bigger distance
Reduces the length of freeze, flash and poison effects by half
Your finger tabs for destroying rocks have a bigger range
